segments.text: Would you mind telling me your grades in high school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . My school record was above average in my class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . What was your favorite subject in middle school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: English . I've liked English ever since middle school , and then in university , I had some excellent teachers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How were your scores in university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are above 90 . I â€™ m in the upper third of my class . I have worked hard at my major subject .
segments.speaker: S2
